name: DNOMO Mag Safe Compatible System
description: The DNOMO® is the ultimate all-in-one solution for your phone, wallet, and keys. Designed for convenience and versatility, it combines a sleek, anti-slip wallet with a flexible magnetic grip, allowing you to attach, stand, and carry your essentials with ease. Whether you’re at home, in the car, or on the go, the DNOMO® keeps your essentials within reach and organized.

name: DNOMO® System
description: DNOMO® Attachment system will fit on most non-flip phones & cases. It is transferable so if you change phones or cases you can reattach the DNOMO® to the new phone or case.

name: Mag Safe Compatible Starter Pack
description: DNOMO is an accessory that attaches to most smart phones. The mag safe compatible wallet holds up to 5 cards, with RFID blocker and has a clip that allows you to attach it to your waist without the support of a holster or belt. It also has a magnetic grip with built in mirror.
features: Mag safe compatible wallet holds up to 5 cards
Includes 1 peel and stick magnetic button

name: DNOMO Starter Pack
description: DNOMO is an accessory that attaches to most smart phones. The wallet holds up to 5 cards and has a clip that allows you to attach it to your waist without the support of a holster or belt and to your purse. It also has a magnetic grip that makes it easier to hold your phone.

name: 3 Pack Magnetic Buttons
description: Peel and stick Magnetic Buttons that adheres to any flat surface. It allows you to attach your phone/wallet/key or your keys separately anywhere and view your phone hands free.

name: Magnetic Key Fob
description: Magnetic Key Fob that sticks to any metal. Combine it with the DNOMO wallet it will attach to the Magnetic Grip to create the DNOMO Phone, Wallet, Key Solution.

name: DNOMO Magnetic Charging Kit
description: 1 3ft USB charging magnetic cable, tip swivels and illuminates. 3 Magnetic Ports.
